New Records: Heinrich Nortje became the first South African bowler to take a career-best 4-7 in a T20 World Cup match
South Africa secured their first win in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: South Africa won by six wickets
Theekshana had LBW review against Klaasen
Post-Match Reflections: Markram happy with South Africa’s efforts
Hasaranga says it was a ‘130-140 run wicket’
Nortje named man of the match
South Africa go top of Group D
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York
South Africa’s Heinrich Klaasen, right, and batting partner David Miller leave the field after their win
